moves.name: Feinting Strike
moves.description: Deal light damage. If the target is affected by a debuff, gain Style.

moves.name: Now You See Me
moves.description: Become Invisible for 1 turn. Gain Evasion and cannot be targeted directly.

moves.name: Now You Don't
moves.description: Break invisibility to deal bonus damage. Always crits if used from Invisible.

moves.name: Smoke & Mirrors
moves.description: Summon an illusion that draws enemy attacks for 1 turn.

moves.name: Pocket Surprise
moves.description: Pull a hidden item from Naice's coat. Random effect.

moves.name: Pocket Sand
moves.description: Blind a target, reducing accuracy for 2 turns.

moves.name: Cutting Remark
moves.description: Insult an enemy, lowering Attack and increasing chance they target Naice.

moves.name: Change the Stage
moves.description: Swap positions of any two units on the battlefield.

moves.name: False Opening
moves.description: Enemy is tricked into attacking Naice; if they miss, they are Stunned.

moves.name: Take a Bow
moves.description: Recover Style and grant allies minor buffs if Naice avoided damage last turn.

moves.name: Escape Artist
moves.description: Remove all control effects from self and teleport to a safe tile.

moves.name: Grand Distraction
moves.description: All enemies suffer Accuracy down and Attack down for 2 turns.

moves.name: Sleight of Time
moves.description: Delay target's next action and give Naice a bonus turn.

moves.name: Final Act
moves.description: Ultimate: Create multiple illusions, vanish, then reappear dealing damage to all enemies. Gain Style for each enemy affected.
